  Heroes of a Broken Land is a classic turn-based RPG, with first person
  dungeon crawling with a large world to explore, plus town management.
  Recruit multiple teams of heroes, and explore countless dungeons in the
  search for fame and fortune. Each game is procedurally generated and unique
  for countless possible adventures.

  Features:
  ~~~~~~~~~
  - Procedurally generated worlds and dungeons for unlimted replay
  - Customize your world - from tiny worlds to epic adventures
  - Choose one of six Wizards to control, each with a unique power
  - Build your town and ally with others to expand your kingdom
  - 15 classes and races of heroes to recruit
  - Command multiple parties of adventurers
  - Explore epic multi-party dungeons
  - Battle challenging monsters, face devious traps

  URL: http://wingedpixel.com/heroes-of-a-broken-land/
  URL: http://www.desura.com/games/heroes-of-a-broken-land
